content: Hello Jeyachandran! It's good to meet you. Can you start by telling me about your experience as a React developer at SKEWESS TECH? What was your role and what were some of the key responsibilities you had in that internship?

Yes sir, I completed many internships like Centrillion Lab and Fabramon and Science Logic. In my Fabramon lab, I am a full stack developer. In Centrillion Lab, I am a data engineer and Science Logic, I am a developer.

So you have had a diverse range of experiences across different roles and companies. Can you elaborate on the React application you developed for the online signing system during your internship at SKEWESS TECH? What specific features did you implement, and how did you approach building and deploying the application? And also, what was your favorite part about working on that project?
Yes sir, I create a project for the event management. It is four login, one is user login and admin login and club member and club head login.

It sounds like the React application you developed was for an event management system. That's a very interesting project. Can you walk me through the design decisions you made for the authentication system, specifically for the four login options you mentioned? For example, how did you handle the user role-based access control and ensuring that each user type (user, admin, club member, club head) only had the necessary permissions?
